overview:
Ross Elliott is one of the founders of Accellos. He provides a blend of technical and business acumen that results in solutions that solve business problems in a technologically elegant fashion.

Prior to Accellos, Ross was the VP of Business Strategy for Infor Global Solutions. Ross worked with corporate marketing, sales and engineering to synthesize a strategy that provided value to the company and to its customers. Previously, Ross was the VP of Products and Strategy for NxTrend Technology.
